titleStmt.title: The French Kings new declaration (being his publick manifesto in vindication of himself and the late King James from being any ways aiding, assisting or privy to the late intended assassination of King William.) / Translated from the original at Paris.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Vray, book-seller in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Dated from Our Court at Versailes, April the first, 1696.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
